allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead(''tmc-redacao-analise-ideias-projeto.docx''); $entry = $zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_FullName -eq ''word/document.xml'' }; $stream = $entry.Open(); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($stream); $xml = $reader.ReadToEnd(); $reader.Close(); $zip.Dispose(); [xml]$doc = $xml; $doc.SelectNodes(''//w:t'', @{w=''http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main''}) | ForEach-Object { $_InnerText }")
